article_title: NYC Police Officer Shot Saturday in Critical But Stable Condition
article_text:
NEW YORK—An undercover New York City police officer who was shot early Saturday evening in Queens remains in critical but stable condition at Jamaica Hospital, while the suspect in his shooting has been charged with the crime.

Officer Brian Moore, age 25, was shot in the face through the window of his unmarked police car by a man he was attempting to stop early Saturday evening, authorities said.

Police say the suspect,...
